objects.specification: A flat rectangular floor surface with a smooth neutral-tone finish, sized approximately 8 meters wide and 10 meters deep, designed to serve as the base of the exhibition booth.
A tall back wall panel standing 3 meters high, 8 meters wide, with a neutral matte finish to frame the rear of the booth.
A left side wall standing 3 meters high and 10 meters deep, finished in a neutral tone to provide a clean backdrop.
A right side wall standing 3 meters high and 10 meters deep, finished in a neutral tone to provide a clean backdrop.
A front wall panel with an open entrance cutout centered in the middle, standing 3 meters high and 8 meters wide, finished in a neutral matte tone.
A simple rectangular raised platform with a metallic neutral finish, sized precisely to fit the base of the demo car, elevating it slightly above the floor.
A modern sleek demonstration car model painted in bright red with a glossy finish, featuring aerodynamic contours, detailed wheels, tinted windows, and branded accents along its body.
A tall slim rectangular display panel with a glossy front surface for high-resolution branding graphics, featuring a branded header area and a neutral white frame.
A tall slim rectangular display panel with a glossy front surface for high-resolution branding graphics, featuring a branded header area and a neutral white frame.
A small rectangular reception counter with a smooth complementary finish, featuring a flat top for brochures and an open underside for staff.
A small rectangular reception counter with a smooth complementary finish, featuring a flat top for brochures and an open underside for staff.
A small round-top table with a smooth complementary finish on a single central pedestal, designed for visitor interaction.
A small round-top table with a smooth complementary finish on a single central pedestal, designed for visitor interaction.
A simple modern metal-framed chair with upholstered seat and backrest, neutral-tone finish, designed for visitor seating.
A simple modern metal-framed chair with upholstered seat and backrest, neutral-tone finish, designed for visitor seating.
A simple modern metal-framed chair with upholstered seat and backrest, neutral-tone finish, designed for visitor seating.
A simple modern metal-framed chair with upholstered seat and backrest, neutral-tone finish, designed for visitor seating.
An overhead directional spotlight with a warm white beam, designed to focus intense light onto the demo car platform below.
An overhead directional spotlight with a warm white beam, designed to focus intense light onto the demo car platform below.
